content.detailedDescription: I observed the object overhead transiting the sky going through the light spectrum from brilliant white to fire gold.  then it stopped and hovered above... then in my mind i saw two grey's and they said that they had new information to provide me regarding energy and anti gravity then i blacked out and woke up knowing that gravity really isnt gravity its an effect of other processes and when i combined this knowledge with the energy device they provided me they merged together to enable the creation of nonlinear antigravitational technology that i.Am willing and able to describe in full detail, and will release to the public via linkedin  within a week... i am also capable of translation of nontarrestrial texts.
content.summary: Scientific uploading of information.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the 'contact in the desert - iv' event, held at joshua tree 
retreat center (j.T.R.C) from june 2nd to the 6th, 2016 with friends.

on saturday evening, our small ce-5 oc team went out to the 
skywatch at about 10:00 pm after the evening presentations were done. 
a lady from sedona, az was holding a planned demonstration of her 
night vision scopes. the crowd was rather “loud” and in a party atmosphere. 
she was using a p.A. to "talk over" the noise 
of the large group that was present.

there were a number of night scopes available and there was 
a lot of "tire kicking" going on, mostly looking up, for moving objects.
the sky was pretty exceptional; mars was like a “red piece of coal” 
to the south. the milky-way was pretty bright as it was the 
“new moon night”, being june 4th. the orion overlook is on a rise, 
on the j.T.R.C. property, overlooking the campground, in the wash, 
below, and faces pretty much north.

at about 10:10 pm. things started happening!  i was sitting 
with friends on the dirt road at the edge of the concrete pad 
for the orion overlook.

as the lady was demonstrating the night vision scopes, 
someone yelled that there was something coming out of the west 
(from the highway 62 direction). a orb of light appeared, flying 
quite low, moving at maybe 30 to 50 mph, heading east-ward. 
i think that the first one i saw was green.

i was sitting in my camp chair still trying to set up my camera 
and i saw it coming from the far left.  it was to the left of a 
young tree on the edge of the road and i was seeing it pass 
behind this tree (at my angle through the branches)...
then it passed cleanly to the right of the tree.  i tried to re-focus 
my binoculars.. everything behind it was sharp, but the lighted 
object was fuzzy.  it was cruising at what i estimate at about 
500 feet off the ground (agl) and maybe 1,000 feet in front of us,
across the campground wash (from l to r), but appeared to be still  
in front of the far hillside.

then, again, someone yelled "there’s another one" (same path)!
this one i think was blue. i tried to get my camera screwed 
onto the tripod; i could not get the threads to catch - darn -
and people were all shouting...What a joke...Finally, the threads 
caught!  i wasn’t expecting to see anything and was ill-prepared 
to say the least with my olympus point & shoot. i got my camera 
turned on, in video mode, and just left it run for a while.

i thought i might catch something...As bright as the orbs were.
in the end, all i got was the sound of the crowd and a couple 
of dots of light! i stopped and started the video several times, 
as i was not sure how much space i had remaining on my 
sd card.

then, someone yelled "there’s another – there’s another", 
while laughing. sure enough, they just kept coming... 
another and another showed up...
don’t remember all the colors; i lost track of how many.
my friend were chorgling…and laughing…i heard my name 
called out…

i was thinking to myself - "were they drones?
my little drone has red & green lights, it can’t fly that high…
or that steady…(not with me as pilot!)". these were flying, 
literally for "miles". mine doesn’t have the battery life or 
i thought, "who would be flying these things for our benefit 
or embarrassment...If these were professional or military 
grade drones..Why did we not see the craft or air-frame?"  
i do remember seeing one of our people's green laser 
pointers reflected off of one...Something shiny… like a 
"baby moon" hubcap.  "was it a force field?" i thought...

they seemed to be flying along the same glide-path (like geese) 
spaced about about 20 to 25 seconds apart.
they all appeared to be of equal radiance; green, blue and gold 
colored ’orbs of light’; maybe a reddish-gold one too. 
i saw at least four of them, maybe more.

there was no sound (well, no sound i could hear over the 
chatter of the 60 or so people, screaming and laughing).  
some people were trying to be quiet without much success.

my binoculars were in focus, but the orbs were still soft-edged.
i could see sort of energy rings "modulating" around in them,
when using my binoculars.  the light was pretty bright and 
steady, otherwise.

some guys flashed their green laser pointers at them.
the lady, excitedly said, stop laser-ing!...Wait until you are 
sure that they are not aircraft...With flashing red & green lights!

she then, gave them the go-ahead to signal…three pulses of light...
(dot-dot-dot) and some of the orbs did respond, likewise!
i saw at least one of the orbs responded back to the three pulses 
of light with three bright pulses (back to dimmer light) of its own.
yeow!   my chest was about to explode, i had forgot to breathe!

i did not see the following happen, but someone in the group 
was saying that when the orbs moved off to the right 
(beyond my view through all the people) that they slowed down 
their speeds, joined up and sped off "like jets"; or, 
in three different directions...Maybe into a triangle 
and then moving off??? just hear-say...As i didn't see them 
do any maneuvers.

i hope that the lady's "crew" has some video come out!!!

there were about 2,500 people in attendance at the 
‘contact in the desert iv‘ event. the temperature got into the 
triple-digits during mid-day, but it got quite cool at night.

the short video segments i recorded are large files and not worth much,  
except to verify that there were a lot of excited people in attendance 
and announcing the "next arrivals".
content.summary: Four+ orbs entered field of view at the orion lookout (on the same glide-path, one at a time) about 25 sec. apart; some responded to green laser pointers (3 flashes got 3 bright pulses); surface of orbs reflected laser, like a baby-moon hubcap

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

i have observed numerous ufo's on soho satellite images over the last 3 days or so, in fact too many to report..Though i have been collecting numerous good images.

however i need to report the following..Without delay.

two craft in close proximity to each other and the sun.

they are clearly technologically advanced craft as they are metallic and one in particular shows much detail, quite marvelous in fact.

first craft is possibly a multi layered flying disk of some sort.

other craft, (of which a close-up is included) looks to me vaguely reminiscent of one of the old fashioned divers helmets in general shape. it has a light on its side, and it seems to be similar on the 'front' aswell (facing to left), though no light is on. 

the body is metallic and reflective of its surroundings.

my impression is that it might be travelling from right to left, but this may not be the case.

quite frankly i was amazed at the sheer detail on this thing. i stared at it for quite some time, mostly in an attempt to estimate its size. it seems close to what probably is a large flying disc and is big and bulky by comparison. 

size is indeterminate, but likely large to very large given the way it is so prominent near the bottom right of the main soho picture...And in comparison to other objects.

please note: there are in fact multiple objects of interest on this main soho picture, but i happen to be focussing in particular on the "diving helmet" due to the factors i have gone into.

 i am not sure if relative distances are a big factor or not. probably not to any significant level, but you may wish to analyse things further.

mufon definitely needs to see this craft in particular which is why i am sending it to you asap.

fyi file 4 is the most important/interesting image for me. file 5 is a mistaken repetition of file#3.

please make some comment when you can.


kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Two ufo's near each other in close proximity to sun. one unusual with details on it.

content.detailedDescription: Spanning an approximately 10-minute period beginning at about 10:30 pm, we observed a total of seven (7) continuously-luminous flying objects approached joshua tree retreat center (jtrc) at very high speed over the western horizon (direction of yucca valley). the objects arrived singly, one after the other, and in pairs at irregular intervals over the approximate 10-minute period. none of the objects exhibited standard red, green or white blinking aircraft navigation lights. each object flew exceedingly smoothly, silently and rapidly towards the east and then each turned smoothly toward the north/northeast when they arrived directly north of the jtrc grounds. the distance to the flying craft was estimated to be less than two miles, but could have been as little as one mile away at their closest approach to the jtrc. throughout their approach from the west and eventual disappearance to the north, the objects emitted a continuous pale bluish/green to soft amber light. the craft were sufficiently bright and large to be very easily observed without the assistance of night-vision optics or binoculars. at irregular intervals during their flight trajectories, each craft displayed bright flashes of an iridescent green glow. the glowing flashes did not appear to emanate from a fixed point on the craft, but rather seemed to be diffuse in nature and sweep over the craft in an uneven manner. the flash duration was about 1 second or less. as mentioned above, the craft were fairly close (estimated 1-2 miles) and when the green flashes occurred, it was just possible to make out some kind of hull structure to the craft, i.E., the craft did not appear as sharp points of light or amorphous balls of light. when the craft were targeted by one or more hand-held lasers, they sometimes flashed green. but they also flashed a green glow at times when they were not illuminated by lasers. from its first appearance on the western horizon, each object took about 30 seconds (or possibly less) to complete its west-to-east flyby past the jtrc, perform the sweeping northerly turn, and subsequently gradually disappear over the northern horizon. the estimated distance of the objects when they first appeared over the western horizon was 5 miles. similarly, the estimated distance to the point of disappearance in the north was also 5 miles, resulting in a total (visible) flight trajectory of 10 miles. assuming this distance was traveled in 30 seconds or less, the minimum speed of the objects may be estimated at about 1200 miles per hour. importantly, no sound of any kind was detected as the objects flew past, which would be consistent with an unconventional (i.E., non-jet engine) type of propulsion system.
content.summary: Very fast flying continuously-luminous craft flashing green glow at irregular intervals

content.detailedDescription:
I observed something very strange on evening of june 10, 2016 at approximately 9:10pm est from ormond beach, fl 32176. i was outside in my side yard looking west when from my left (south) i observed what appeared to be a fireball entering from high in the south. it traveled north north west. it was approximately 3 times brighter than jupiter (which was up) and very bright white yellow orange and had a slight tail pointing south. i instantly thought fireball, but the object was slowing down, so i instantly thought this object was space junk. this object was "dropping" what appeared to be hot material that was same color as the object. the object continued to slow down and dripped the strange material two times on its trajectory before the object slowed to a complete static stop. i was baffled to say the least. as the object remained stationary it dripped the bright material momentarily. the flight time from when i saw the object to when it came to a complete static stop was approximately 10 seconds - which is far too long of a time for any fireball or space junk, which i've witnessed countless times. i observed this object stationary for approximately 2 minutes in absolute amazement. i had my iphone in my hand and shot one still photo of the object prior to it coming to a complete stop and i shot video as well. all you can see is a small dot due to iphone camera not suited for shooting in dark. it also showed up on the video. while observing the object stationary for approximately 2 minutes i decided to take a chance a run in the house a grab a real camera, which only took about 2 minutes to retrieve, when i went back outside it was gone and i have no idea what happened to it. i've been a dedicated amateur astronomer for over 40 years and i know the sky well. also visible were commercial jetliners in the sky in the same general area of the sky. this was neither a fireball or space junk - they don't slow down and come to a complete stop in the sky as this object did. it was not the moon, which was up and in different part of the sky. it was not jupiter, which was up and in a different part of the sky. it was not mars, which was up and in a different part of the sky. it was not a satellite. it was not the iss. i'm hoping that others observed this object and will make reports.

sand dunes dr.
ormond beach, fl 32176

time: 9:10pm
date:  6/10/16
shot one still photo and a video that shows object.
weather: mostly clear
content.summary: Came in like a fireball then slowed dramatically then came to complete stop and stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
One more night observing this lights-phenomenon's at my place, which are very usual to cross the sky here, they show up coming from all directions, this one on the video are the most common, but there are also blue, red and a mix of yellow-white. they have a certain place in the sky where they appear and disappear.
my concern is because the sky where i live under, is where the planes take altitude and made a turn to descend to the lisbon airport. also i know what i`m not seeing.
this is a true logistic movement, if this lights are from human machines, then why spend so many $ in projects to mars etc.!? we have the tech already, or not!? i apologise to the video but i have a bad heart condition u makes me tremble the cam. i left the invitation to stay here 2 to 3 hrs in one night if some one get pleased, it will not be wasted time.
like columbo, the detective, i have a last question: will this planet belongs to humans? or as in the past we are serving these entities at any level?
thank you all
sal
content.summary: Ufo was airborne on south at 75º in a curved open angle of flight of 120º direction n, ne, very bright light.

content.detailedDescription: We were in a park when we observed the object in the sky. it was not like and airplane or something similar. we thought that maybe would be a satellite but we were very suspicious about the object. it looked very distant and reflective, not very easy to see. we had the feeling that was something weird and tried to take some pictures with a camera (60mm lens). for our surprise, the camera was able to catch it (we had to use the trees as a reference to take the picture and also to be able to find the little dot later).
content.summary: Being in a park we observed a very distant and unusual (for us) object in the sky for many minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I will attempt to be succinct in order to keep this report brief.  please call me for additional details.  i am the owner of ufo sighting tours in sedona, az.  i have completed 588 tours with the use of pvs 7, gen. 3 military night vision goggles (nvgs).  i was hired by the citd conference to run their night vision events at this year’s 2016 conference running june 2 thru 6, 2016.  the previous 4 listed reports on this site from joshua tree, ca were from attendees of the saturday, june 4th event that i led.  i know many additional people that were in attendance who may be contacted for reports/interviews and i may provide phone numbers.  i am a trained observer and a past mufon investigator.  i was a past member of the board for mufon oc, ca.
on june 4th well over 100 people were gathered at orion’s point lookout, a location at the joshua tree retreat center.  at approx. 10:00 or just prior, most of the attendees witnessed what i am about to describe.  there were 18 pairs of nvgs provided, as well as many individuals privately owned goggles present.  yet the following were clearly visible with the naked unaided eye and were seen by most present without equipment.  the following sightings lasted approx. 20 minutes total time.  i was busy leading the group and instructing them on a pa system and did not note the time, but many of those present informed me after the fact.  videos of this event are surfacing and are being gathered.  a professional documentary film crew was present on behalf of citd and achieved footage of these sightings, but i have not seen it.  i will provide it as soon as it is available.
as i witnessed it:  approaching from the west and flying east across the valley in front of us, and coming low over a hill, were the following large colored lights flying extremely fast.  first to appear was a blue light, then shortly thereafter a red or amber light, and then 2 bright green ones.  after a brief pause of a few minutes came 2 more green ones followed by a single green one, again, flying over the hill at an extremely rapid speed.  this second grouping then slowed way down and came together to form a distinct triangle formation and continued to fly across the valley maintaining this formation traveling all the way in a very slow even pace.  eventually this formation disappeared from vision right in front of us.  i was not holding nvgs at the time, but those that were said this triangle formation was seen speeding up and shooting up off into space.  many said that somewhere in this mix was a purple light, but i did not see that.  this was a total thus far of about 7 clearly visible craft.
people were yelling out, applauding and very excited during these events.  after a about 5 minutes had passed, jimmy church, popular radio talk show host and his wife rita approached me.  a friend of theirs’s had called them on her cell and told them to come quick!  i informed them they just missed some remarkable sightings.  when suddenly in comes yet another large green light from over the same hill to the west.  and shortly after even another green light.  they witnessed these 2 green lights (naked eye) along with other objects that they saw using the nvgs over the next 10 mins.  soon after those 2 green ones, a very large amber light came right over us all and very quickly disappeared right above us.  including this amber one, the total crafts sighted in about 20 minutes was well over 10.  all 10 major sightings were way, way, way too fast to be satellites, completely silent, went from hauling in to slowing down to a snail’s pace immediately, and then completely disappeared before us.  all of which are things military jets and satellites can not do!  we started viewing that night at 8:30 p.M. and didn’t stop till 11:30 p.M. and continued to have sightings on and off the whole while.  i educate everyone on all the various type of planes, shooting stars, and all about satellites in order to be able to rule those out.  then and only then are we left with unknown or unidentified objects.  all these sightings were clearly unidentified!
also in use were multiple high powered green lasers.  i had brought eight 5-mile, two 10-mile, and one 100-mile visible length of beam lasers and they were distributed throughout the crowd and some people had brought their own.  as these 10 total objects over about 20 minutes were witnessed many people were hitting them with the lasers.  we use the lasers both for pointing out objects and for flashing at them to get possible ufos to flash back.  this has proven successful on most of my tours.  as these 10 objects were hit by lasers, myself and others realized that while some may have been flashing back in response, that most likely our lasers were hitting actual metallic surfaces and reflecting off of the objects!  many of the people standing near me, including jimmy church, thought this is what we were actually seeing.  this would also mean that these objects were extremely close.
the response from the crowd had been overwhelming.  many people have expressed that this was a paradigm changing event for them.  i’m spoiled.  i get to see real sightings on all my tours.  but this night, same as those, i loved providing that experience for others.  i never get tired of people’s reactions.  for me, it’s always confirmation that ufos are real and seeing them is truly believing.
content.summary: Mass sighting at contact in the desert conference of 10 fast mulitple colored objects

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed what i thought was an airplane moving slowly across the night sky from the west (sfo airport), towards the east. however, as the large bright orange object approached, fairly low in the sky, i noticed that it did not have the port and starboard flashing lights of a regular airplane flying  at night. the ufo looked fairly large and was moving at a low altitude, probably approximately the same height as an aircraft that had just taken off from sfo airport and was now flying at a height of approx 1 mile. the other thing that i noticed was that the ufo was moving in straight line, but fairly slowly in the sky, much slower than a regular aircraft. as the ufo approached, i noticed that it then began to zig zag across a straight line the sky, at a controlled rate of speed, making abrupt turns. the speed of the ufo then began to change and then suddenly, it changed direction at approximately 90 degrees, then just shot straight up into space towards the right of the north star at an incredible speed  and disappeared  i have never seen anything like this in my lifetime, until now.
i have to admit, that it made the hair stand up on my head and i think that i will have quite a few sleepless nights thinking about this from now on. i would be interested to know if there is anyone else who witnessed the same sighting as me.
content.summary: Object moved in a straight line, then began to zig zag across the sky, then shot off in opposing direction at high speed into space and disappeared.D

content.detailedDescription: We were standing out front changing parts on the car there were 4 to 5 of us and all saw the same thing...It was a ball of light very bright..Standing still then  slowly moved to the west we watched it until it just vanished ..I'm not one to believe in these things but i can not un see what i saw...
content.summary: Very bright moon like sphere while fixing engine we all looked up and saw it sitting there then move and dissappear

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing in the backyard around 9:15 pm stargazing with my wife using my binoculars, normally with my 8" scope, but spotting with the binoculars for the evening. i always concentrate around the belt of orion area, my favorite star gazing target.

 decided to expand my scanning to the west of the belt, randomly. i noticed three "stars", about 30 degrees west of the belt, that i normally have never noticed before, they were standing still and in a random pattern, no symmetry. i still thought they were just random "stars", but curiosity kept me examining them through the binoculars.

 i soon as i really took a good look through the binoculars at the three "stars", it was if they knew i was looking at them and all three took off in random directions, one took off east, one went west, and the third did an immelmann turn and headed south, very, very quickly, disappearing in seconds.

 i was excited, awestruck, and explained to my wife (standing five feet away) what i just saw. i kept searching for a few minutes and could not relocate. these "stars" were at a very high altitude, if not out of the atmosphere. there were no trails, plumes, or streaks when they shot away. they took off and like a light turning off disappeared.


the three objects scattered in three random directions in a couple of seconds. disappearing after only seconds of moving away.
content.summary: Three stars (no apparent formation) that took off in opposing directions

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the porch when i saw a bright red light through the trees. i thought it was a drone from the prom party a street over.Until i noticed it was moving in my direction and had no sound. as it come more from behind the trees. i got up and went to the clearing and noticed it had a smaller white light attached to it. which when the red did the tripple flash you could see structure between the 2 lights. it looked like it was going about 10mph. and while passing me almost looked like it stopped and rotated. like it was looking at me. but then just kept on going in a east direction.I texted my sister to come out and see it. then tried to record it but my phone wasnt seeing it. even with the big bright flashing stobe. which you could end up seeing from 30miles away.
content.summary: Bright  red tripple flash pattern. with small white light connected about 30' from it.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in our backyard enjoying the night sky and suddenly we saw an orb flying across the sky and as we saw the first orb fly above our home, another orb came over, following the first. we were in shock and suddenly we saw another and another, for a total of 20 orbs. it was round, very bright and no sound was heard. they moved very fast and at times hovered momentarily and then moved quickily through the night sky. we lost sight of the object as it moved across the night sky to the northwest. momentous event as we have never experienced anything like this before.
content.summary: We saw 20 red/orange orbs moving fast, no sound, never have seen object before and never wiill forget this event.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with dogs for end of day backyard visit heard jet in sky to the north saw and identified aircraft beacons while noticing plane to north east observed very bright ord moving toward the south east stayed focused on ord no sound but very bright and it appeared to wobble or flutter while on flight path in a straight forward vector. continued observation until in south sky took 2 pictures of object could also clearly see stars. after picture was taken object lost brilliance and faded out while moving in a south east direction toward lake simcoe. event was witnessed by partner.
content.summary: Heard jet sounds identified airplane in north sky by aircraft flashing beacons saw white orb  to north east moving across sky bright to the south no sound but fluttering from time to time

content.detailedDescription: With my dad looking at stars. he said he can see mars. i look at the bright redish star-like light and say no way that's mars. we eventually realize it is moving. at first we think it is a plane, but a plane was right next to it with its blinking lights. the object then flew at a steady quick rate much faster than the planes and would swerve in a snake like pattern. it then faded once away from us. not sure what it was, but definitely not a plane or satellite
content.summary: Bright light that moved snakelike and then faded away

content.detailedDescription: Two glowing orbs witnessed of back deck of home hovered, moved slowly south easterly behind trees and did not reappear on the other side for an approximate total of 2 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange glowing ball (2) tried to video tape on iphone

content.detailedDescription: and june 9 at approximately 10:15 pm my son was getting out of the car and noticed some green light in the sky then he asked me as i was getting some things out of the trunk mommy what are those green lights i had no idea what he was talking about and i said where he said in the sky i looked in the sky and seen a saucer type object that was neon green and had bright lighting around it.  we both stared at the object as it stayed still then it moved upward and stood still.  my son and i ran to tell a neighbor then less than 30 seconds the object dissapeared.
content.summary: Green saucer type spacecraft with lighted lights

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside smoking, saw weird ball with movement i have never soon. took video until object vanished/ exploded in air.
content.summary: Noticed bright ball of movement that is not plane firework chinese lantern etc.

content.detailedDescription:
sunday 6-5-2016. while flying my private aircraft, shortly after takeoff and still in the traffic pattern i encountered an unidentified object at approx 1000 ft agl.  object was going in opposite direction and passed within 300 ft off my left wing. it was a metallic orb that reflected the light brilliantly, and was approx the size of a basketball. at this point i banked hard left to chase it, placing my aircraft at its 6:00 position. almost immediately the object did a hard left turn accelerating to a position opposite my left wing, and within 150 ft. i banked hard left again and became engaged in a two turn "dogfight" with the object as we both tried to get on each others tail. 
after the second turn the object broke away in a southern direction. i lost sight after that. this is the second encounter with an identical object while in the air. the last encounter was in 1978.
content.summary: Air to air encounter.

content.detailedDescription: I was going e on m50 from dundee michigan when i saw this black line in the sky that stayed perfectly still.  i saw it there for about 10 minutes and then i turned on to herr rd to go south and when i turn to go east again it was gone.  at first i thought it was a plane but it never moved and was very still.  i then thought it to be a ufo because it didn't move.
content.summary: Going e on m 50 and saw this black line int he sky just left of the nuclear plant smoke stacks then i turned to go south and when i turned back to e it was gone..

content.detailedDescription: My mother and special needs sister went up to a family member barn to see the horses and walk around the farm. take pictures of my sister and animals. my mother later that day came home and sent me the 3 pictures of my sister and the horse and chicken. first picture of three got my interest 2nd picture upper left hand corner really peeked my interest, their picture nothing. my family truly believes that there is so much more then we even know or can explain. if mufon can give some insight to these pictures it will be great fully appreciated.
content.summary: Mom sent pics to me of my sis and i saw an a anomaly in picture,

content.detailedDescription: I, age 21. was at my house one april night when a friend stopped by and asked me if i wanted to go for a drive. i said yes, and we drove out around a power plant outside boulder, colorado. the power plant was called rocky flats, and on the opposite side of the road, there was a field. when we drove by the field, all of the sudden there were these rotating lights in the field by the side of the road. i immediately thought that it was a flying saucer. the driver stopped and parked, and we just sat there in silence watching this craft. it had a silver exterior and all the lights that were rotating around it were all white. they didn't blink or anything they just rotated. i felt like i should leave the car and walk up and touch it, but i knew my friend didn't want to so i just stayed in the car. after about 20 minutes of just sitting there watching it, it just zoomed straight up in the air and flew away vertically out of sight. we didn't get out of the car and check the field or anything and we didn't see any little green men, we just drove away and didn't say anything to each other for a long time.
content.summary: Anonymous; age 21, was driving with a high school friend on a road near rocky flats power plant in boulder colorado, when an object on the ground caught us off gaurd and we watched it until it flew off.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my mom with my two daughters and was leaving her house around 7:30 on a very clear dark winter evening. it was a sunday evening. came to a junction at thd end of her street and stopped ti check for on coming traffic when i noticed a re light passing above my car. at first i thought it was an aeroplane but it wax very low and moving very slowly so i asked my eldest daughter if she could see it and she said yes what is it? i said o didn't know so we got put of the car to have a look and it was then that i noticed the lights at each point and a large glowing circular part underneath which was like a glass dome with molten liquid churning or spinning and changing direction much like a washing machine doing its cycle.It wax completely silent and just gliding very slowly overhead. my daughter asked me again what it was and i told her it must be a ufo because whatever it was didn't look like it was made anywhere on this planet. just the shear size of it and the fact that it was barley moving and completely silent made me wonder how it managed to stay up in the sky. my youngest daughter stayed in yhe cat and crying hysterical when she seen it. i think maybe because i was do excited about what it was may have scared her. it just kept moving in a straight line until it went out if sight behind some trees in the skyline.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with red lights at each point and a row of red and orange lights across the cackling. had a glass dome underneath  with like molten liquid or flames churning around inside the glass dome on the center of the triangle. completely silent and

content.detailedDescription: Was walking the marine park at about 1030  that night and watched 2 lights cross crossing each other in the  sky from east to west n the southern skys over bellingham bay. watched them for  about 5 mins as i walked around. then they disappeared instantly
content.summary: Star like but bigger criss crossng  the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Very fast moving orange object off of the ocean next to the mountain then four more joined it they hovered then changed directions headed south we are used to see coast guard these were not helicopters moved too fast and stopped to quickly
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 moving object stop hovered changed direction and left

content.detailedDescription:
Full spectrum camera images

on saturday september 19, 2015 at 2:34 pm, i took some random video with a full spectrum adapted video camera.  after viewing the camera screen quickly, i forgot about it.  when i happened to look more closely on computer at the video on february 20, 2016, i noticed objects that were zooming fast in the video.  

there seem to be two kinds of craft in the 30.3 seconds video.  the larger one which initially seemed like a walnut appeared three places briefly in the video.  the smaller resembled black dots.

the larger craft
	the larger craft began to appear in frame 2:20 and vanished by 2:27 moving to the right in .11 seconds.  
	it reappeared at frame 4:00 moving to the right, reversing and going left, danced upward and left and vanished at frame 5:08, a total of 1.13 seconds.  
	finally it reappeared from frame 26:04 until frame 27:24, lasting 1.33 seconds.

the smaller craft
	dot shaped craft shot up and to the left at 7:52 in 11 frames at a 51° angle in .18 seconds.  
	a second dot shaped craft shot down and to the right at a 31° angle in frames 24:29 through 24:47 in .36 seconds.
	then a third dot shaped craft shot down and to the right at a 45° angle in frames 28:42 to 28:44 in 3/60th of a second.

analysis:
whether or not the infrared and uv light aided in identifying these craft will be interesting to study in the future.  many other reports have been filed by this investigator of similar types of craft coming from and going to blue springs lake.  the upward craft moving to the left seems to have come from nearly nnw at 336° in the lake.  the first downward to the right moving craft dove into the area of the lake at 0°, or due north. it is assumed that this is the same location in the lake where other craft have been seen repeatedly-- which is roughly 1 mile away.

the size of the larger craft appear to be approximately 15ft in diameter based on the size of previous similar craft.  the distance would be roughly 1 mile as well.  it seems to have remained at approximately 12° elevation most of the time, moving back and forth, going in and out of view.

the size of the dot shaped smaller craft appear to be about 2.8 feet, being nearly 19% smaller than the larger ones.

it is interesting to note that the path taken into the lake by the third craft which went downward appears to go precisely to the same location into the lake at 0° where the upward craft came from second craft also went.

conclusion:
the behavior of the walnut-shaped larger sphere was odd in that it would go from invisibility, to visible, move back and forth…and then simply vanished again near the end of the video.  it hovered and seemed to morph to slightly different shapes.  the smaller dot-shaped craft travelled between 275 mph to 330 mph.

the fact that at least two of the smaller downward craft entered at the exact same location cannot be coincidence.  the odds of this occurring are 332,212 to 1.   case # 60295 reported an object coming from the lake and doing a zig zag in the air….Coming from almost precisely the same location as both of the downward craft entered the lake.  the odds of this is also 332,212 to 1.  the dual coincidences taken together actually increase the odds significantly to 110,364.81 〖x10〗^6 to 1.  clearly, these are common locations used by craft.
content.summary: Full spectrum camera caught images of a larger spheroid craft and 3 smaller dot shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck last night and saw the craziest thing.  at least a dozen lights flew over the tree line moving north east.  most were green and maybe two were red and at least one blue.  they were in a weird haphazard formation and were moving erratically in what i'd describe as a sort of jumping manner.  there was also a really bright white light behind them that looked to be about four or five times as big, and it moved along in the way i'd describe how a balloon floats when you release it into the air.  it seemed to almost be hanging in the air.  i called my roommate out to see them, and we watched them move off into the distance with the colored lights far outpacing the white one.  i've seen loads of planes and these weren't planes.  i wonder where the closest air force base is to fort dodge?
content.summary: Formation of 12 green lights moving erratically ne followed by a slower moving white orb

content.detailedDescription:
At 2138 hours one of two flaming objects appeared from the ne heading s-sw.  the second object in question appeared at 2141 hours and copied the first.  direction of travel at first sighing was from the ne coming from the mt.Baldy area heading south to southwest.  objects then seemed to stall in flight then make a direct turn to the east.  upon making a easterly movement, fire seemed to go out and all we could see at that point and beyond were orange glows as it traveled away.
these objects both had nose profiles (aka wings) as a result of subsonic pressure coefficients during their sw path and were fully engulfed in fire.  after 
someone had to of seen these objects and has photos or an explanation of what they saw.  i am also looking for anyone that was on american airlines 1116 flight out of lax on 6/7/2016. there were 2 “ufo” of sorts just off of their port side wing tip and above them in altitude. 
aa flight 1116 was passing thru 8000' at the time as i tracked it on flight radars mobile app.  the plane passed under the objects for a few seconds.  reason i know that is they disappeared as the plane passed.

i have contacted all local news, la times, long beach airport, jpl and nobody saw anything and if they did, they are not talking.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unexplained fireballs over long beach ca

content.detailedDescription: These three black objects flew unlike any planes or helicopters i have ever seen either here or on the mainland. they flew in a triangular motion slowly towards the west for about 15 minutes as i watched and then vanished
content.summary: Flew together in triangular shape then disappeared right in front of me

content.detailedDescription: On 6-7-2016 at approx. 7am, i was traveling east bound on nevada approaching sherwood, in detroit michigan. i noticed in the distance, directly east of me a shiny chrome/silver, round object in the sky. the object appeared to be approx. 1-2 miles away and about 1,000 ft in the air. at first i thought it was a plain landing with it reflecting the sun. the object was slowly getting closer and bigger, but did not change shape or color. the object was maintaining altitude, not losing or gaining. suddenly, within a fraction of a second, the object was now going west, gaining altitude as if it was ascended into space. shortly after the object went from west to east, it was gone. this event lasted around 20-30 seconds. the object never changed shape, color or reflectivity. it never gave any indication of a flight pattern to justify a human air craft. from wes to east without stopping or turning. i have had several past experiences with similar circumstances but just found out about this site today. my last expierence was approximately 7 years ago in st clair shores michigan.
content.summary: Glowing object changed direction and shape
